name: Avoid the Mobsters!
description:
UPDATE AT BOTTOM

You need both files in order to play the game! just run the EXE and have fun!

If windows Firewall stops you, just hit more info and then "run anyway" this is because windows looks out for .exe that don't have a root program folder. The game isn't a virus trust me, I can barely code a mobile game.

-Zeke H.

Update 9/17/21: 

+Added Stages which are infinite

+Added New Fight animation to menu screen

+Added Stage Counter

+Added New Exit Button

+"Scorew" Timer now resets with the start of the new stage making it just a timer.

+Player collision is now temporarily disabled at the end of a stage

-Fixed Bug: previous beta builds would cause a new collision after death which would trigger a new game over screen.

+Player will now get into cartoon "fight" with mobsters instead of just disappearing.

+Mobsters now get faster as each stage progressess.

+Cleaned up some code and cleared some useless strings

+Added Background Changing

+Added Two new Backgrounds, newyork and hell

+Organized timing on player spawn and mobs spawn.

+Changed timing to game over screen, this makes the game move alot quicker after dying.

+Gained more insight on how to code.

H A L L O W E E N - - U P D A T E 

 +Changed the aspect ration on PC and Mobile platforms to 16:9 for easier play 

 +Moved analog stick for mobile (it is also accessible on pc) to the bottom left 

 +Adjusted analog stick sensitivity for better use on touch devices 

+Adjusted player/mob size and background size to scale better 

 +Added new punch feature to the player, player just now needs to directly walk into a mob and they will "hit" the mob, the mob will then disappear 

NOTES: Punching collision is directly in front of the player as good as it can be, you can still die by being sideswiped

 +Mobsters are now wearing costumes! They are all old French mobsters now, so they're Louisiana frogs now. 

 Known Bugs / Missing Features: Adding this because I keep getting told stuff and ideas that I already have pages and pages of notes on. 

 -Player speed and Mob speed still get too fast to be unplayable after awhile. I am countering this with a boss and fight stages every 5 - 7 rounds. 

 -The punching can be worked on more and so could the HUD. I am working on it but here's a release!
